The body of Dr: Timothy J. Cunningham, a CDC doctor, was found in an Atlanta river after he went missing on February 12th.
Dr: Cunningham did not have access to sensitive information regarding infectious diseases and did not deal with them directly.
The claim that Dr: Cunningham warned the public that flu shots caused a deadly flu epidemic is not supported by any credible evidence or sources.
The website Your News Wire: which published the article making the claim, is known for publishing false information and has been deemed a fake news site.
